prompt: Close-up, photorealistic image of a highly detailed, leather-bound first edition book resting on a mahogany desk. The book is open to a page with intricate illustrations and aged parchment. Focus on the texture of the leather, the gold leaf lettering, and the slight imperfections of the paper. Soft, diffused natural light from a nearby window illuminates the scene. The background is blurred, suggesting a grand library. --ar 16:9 --style raw --zoom 1.1
name: rare-books-value-image-1.png

prompt: Wide-angle, photorealistic shot of a rare book auction in progress. The auctioneer stands at a podium under bright spotlights, holding up a beautifully bound book. A diverse crowd of bidders fills the room, their expressions ranging from anticipation to intense focus. The room is opulent, with dark wood paneling and velvet seating. The book is the clear focal point, with a shallow depth of field to blur the background. --ar 16:9 --style raw --zoom 1.0
name: rare-books-value-image-2.png

prompt: Overhead, photorealistic image of a conservator carefully examining a fragile, antique map laid out on a large, well-lit table. The conservator is wearing gloves and using delicate tools such as brushes and magnifying glasses. The map shows signs of age and wear, with creases, tears, and faded ink. The table is clean and organized, with various restoration supplies neatly arranged. Focus on the details of the map and the conservator's hands. --ar 16:9 --style raw --zoom 1.2
name: rare-books-value-image-3.png

prompt: Photorealistic, panoramic view of a vast, multi-level library filled with towering shelves of rare books. Sunlight streams through large arched windows, creating long shadows and highlighting the textures of the old books. The library is quiet and serene, with a few readers scattered throughout. The image should convey a sense of history, knowledge, and wonder. Use a wide depth of field to capture the scale of the library. --ar 16:9 --style raw --zoom 0.9
name: rare-books-value-image-4.png

prompt: Close-up, photorealistic image of a pair of gloved hands carefully turning the brittle pages of a very old, illuminated manuscript. The manuscript features intricate gold leaf designs and hand-painted illustrations. The background is dark and out of focus, drawing attention to the delicate nature of the book. Soft, diffused lighting emphasizes the textures of the parchment and the vibrancy of the colors. The image should evoke a sense of reverence and historical significance. --ar 16:9 --style raw --zoom 1.3
name: rare-books-value-image-5.png
